name: Aerial Blast
description:
Alt + Enter to window game.

Destroy, Jump, Dodge

Aerial Blast is a platformer shooter set in the sky (on sky islands). You have to shoot the orbs while avoiding enemy projectiles. Try to get the fastest time! 

There are 6 levels. Good luck!

This is my first game jam and first Alakajam entry. I think I have done pretty well for my game jam, especially since this is the first time I have actually finished a game. The music was made in the last 20 minutes so don't expect anything of quality.

Made in 48 hours for Alakajam #16.
